about_the_game:
MINDBRINGERS is an action-adventure experience that mixes fast-paced, flashy, strategic combat with a wide variety of puzzles and gripping dialog.

Fight and explore through the astral planes in this epic grand adventure where corruption and idealism will clash once and for all. 

The MINDBRINGERS are astral special forces working directly under the orders of The King, tasked with missions of assassination, espionage, and intelligence gathering. 

Play as ALLURE, the newest and least experienced MINDBRINGER who's just starting to learn the tricks of her trade. Follow her as she fights those who need to be subdued and solves the puzzles of their minds.

Fight and explore through the astral planes in this epic grand adventure where corruption and idealism will clash once and for all. 

The MINDBRINGERS are astral special forces working directly under the orders of The King, tasked with missions of assassination, espionage, and intelligence gathering. 

Play as ALLURE, the newest and least experienced MINDBRINGER who's just starting to learn the tricks of her trade. Follow her as she fights those who need to be subdued and solves the puzzles of their minds.
name: MINDBRINGERS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 or x64
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX10-compliant card with minimum 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: The Energetic Realms have been slowly decaying into tyranny and corruption. It's up to the MINDBRINGERS to put forward a last chance of redemption.
